verses.english: By the fig and the olive ˹of Jerusalem˺,
and this secure city ˹of Mecca˺!<sup foot_note=77628>1</sup>

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ فِىٓ أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
verses.english: Indeed, We created humans in the best form.
But We will reduce them to the lowest of the low ˹in Hell˺,

verses.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
verses.english: except those who believe and do good—they will have a never-ending reward.
Now, what makes you deny the ˹final˺ Judgment?
Is Allah not the most just of all judges?
